title: Query Template
description: A structured query, along with few more metadata to be persisted in the database

label.description: The 'name' of the query. Is assigned by the user via GUI.

comment.description: A more detailed information about the query. Is also assigned by the user via GUI.

lastModified.description: The timestamp of the last modification of the query. If it has not been modified, this is the time of creation.

createdBy.description: The user id in the authentication service of the user that created the query.

invalidTerms.description: An array of Terms that did not pass validation. This is only filled when reading from the backend.
